title: [Self-directed] Flipped Learning-Based Mathematics Problem-Solving Workshop for Enhancing Executive Core Competencies

context.additional_context: Experiential training for professionals with only smartphones to efficiently solve complex mathematical problems

learning_goals: Participants can solve numerical problems in the workplace by applying at least three data analysis techniques.
Participants can complete a real-case-based mathematical model within 24 hours with the support of an expert (analyst).
Participants can utilize a 5-step checklist to evaluate the validity of analytical results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
